info.title: oracle_internal_mobil
info.x-ibm-application-icon: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" width="48" height="48" fill="none"><path fill="#fff" d="M0 0h48v48H0z" style="mix-blend-mode:multiply"/><rect width="47" height="47" x=".5" y=".5" fill="#fff" rx="7.5"/><g clip-path="url(#a)"><path fill="url(#b)" d="M0 0h40v20H0z" transform="translate(4 14)"/></g><rect width="47" height="47" x=".5" y=".5" stroke="#E0E0E0" rx="7.5"/><defs><clipPath id="a"><path fill="#fff" d="M4 14h40v20H4z"/></clipPath><pattern id="b" width="1" height="1" patternContentUnits="objectBoundingBox"><use xlink:href="#c" transform="matrix(.00147 0 0 .00294 0 .353)"/></pattern><image xlink:href="data:image/png;base64," id="c" width="680" height="100"/></defs></svg>

parameters.name: empsUniqID
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the requisition

200.description: The Requisition corresponding to the provided RequisitionID

404.description: No Requisition found for the provided RequisitionID

Gender.title: Gender
Gender.description: Person's gender. Valid values are defined in the list GenderLOV.

DateOfBirth.title: Date of Birth
DateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the person.

PreviousLastName.title: Previous Last Name
PreviousLastName.description: Previous last name of the person, if any.

City.title: Town or City
City.description: Town or city in which the address is located.

MaritalStatus.title: Marital Status
MaritalStatus.description: Person's marital status. Valid values are defined in the list MaritalStatusLOV.

Country.title: Country
Country.description: Country in which the address is located.

Region.title: Region 1
Region.description: Primary region in which the address is located.

LegalEntityId.description: Unique identifier for the legal entity. Valid values are defined in the list LegalEmployerLOV.

PersonNumber.title: Person Number
PersonNumber.description: Number assigned to a person to identify the person uniquely. Does not depend on the person type (employee, contingent worker, etc). Search on this attribute is not case sensitive.

UserName.description: User name for the record. This value is optional and is automatically generated if not specified. Also works with UsernameMatching attribute. Search on this attribute is not case sensitive.

NationalId.title: National ID
NationalId.description: Primary key generated by the application.

Religion.title: Religion
Religion.description: Person's religion. Valid values are defined in the list ReligionLOV.

WorkEmail.title: Email
WorkEmail.description: Person's work email address. Search on this attribute is not case sensitive.

EffectiveStartDate.title: Effective Start Date
EffectiveStartDate.description: Date at the beginning of the period within which the employee is effective.
